languages.text: {n}Глаза Кибеллы превращаются в две раскаленные щелочки.{/n} "Осторожнее, Домин'{name}. Даже тебе не дано служить устами Его. Намерения Его непостижимы — лишь по знакам можем мы угадывать, как угоднее служить каждому из нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Кибеллы превращаются в две раскаленные щелочки.{/n} "Осторожнее, Эним'{name}, ибо тебе, при всем величии и могуществе твоем, не дано служить устами Его. Намерения Его непостигаемы — лишь по знакам вольны мы угадывать то, как угоднее служить каждому из нас".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Кибеллы превращаются в две раскаленные щелочки.{/n} "Осторожнее, Домин'{name}. Даже тебе не дано служить устами Его. Намерения Его непостижимы — лишь по знакам можем мы угадывать, как угоднее служить каждому из нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Enim'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the most we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

{n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Enim'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the most we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

{n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Enim'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

{n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Enim'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

{n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

{n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen.{/n} "Vorsicht, Domin'{name}. Nicht einmal Ihr könnt Euch anmaßen, für Ihn zu sprechen. Seine Pläne sind unergründlich, wir können nichts weiter tun, als die Zeichen zu deuten und zu hoffen, dass unser Dienst Ihn erfreut."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen.{/n} "Vorsicht, Domin'{name}. Nicht einmal Ihr könnt Euch anmaßen, für Ihn zu sprechen. Seine Pläne sind unergründlich, wir können nichts weiter tun, als die Zeichen zu deuten und zu hoffen, dass unser Dienst Ihn erfreut."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Cuidado, Domin'{name}. Ni siquiera usted puede hablar por Él. Sus designios son incognoscibles; lo mejor que podemos hacer es leer las señales y esperar que nuestro servicio Le complazca».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Cuidado, Domin'{name}. Ni siquiera usted puede hablar por Él. Sus designios son incognoscibles; lo mejor que podemos hacer es leer las señales y esperar que nuestro servicio Le complazca».

languages.text: {n}キベラの目が細く眇められる。{/n}「気を付けなさい、ドミン・{name}。あなたであっても、主を代弁することはできない。主の思し召しは想像を超えたところにあるの。私たちにできるのは、サインを読み取り、自分たちの奉仕が主のお気に召すことを願うのみ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの目が細く眇められる。{/n}「気を付けなさい、エニム・{name}。あなたであっても、主を代弁することはできない。主の思し召しは想像を超えたところにあるの。私たちにできるのは、サインを読み取り、自分たちの奉仕が主のお気に召すことを願うのみ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的眼睛眯成了两条细线。{/n}“要当心，秘者{name}。即便是你，也无权揣测祂的旨意。祂的安排高深莫测，而我们唯一能做的事情，便是读懂祂的预示，希望我们的侍奉能令祂满意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的眼睛眯成了两条细线。{/n}“要当心，秘者{name}。即便是你，也无权揣测祂的旨意。祂的安排高深莫测，而我们唯一能做的事情，便是读懂祂的预示，希望我们的侍奉能令祂满意。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah plisse les yeux.{/n} « Attention, Domin'{name}. Même vous ne pouvez prétendre parler à Sa place. Ses desseins sont impénétrables. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire, c'est lire les signes qu'Il nous envoie et espérer que ce que nous accomplissons soit à Sa convenance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah plisse les yeux.{/n} « Attention, Domin'{name}. Même vous ne pouvez prétendre parler à Sa place. Ses desseins sont impénétrables. Tout ce que nous pouvons faire, c'est lire les signes qu'Il nous envoie et espérer que ce que nous accomplissons soit à Sa convenance. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri kısılarak incecik oluyor.{/n} "Dikkatli ol Domin'{name}. Sen bile O'nun adına konuşmaya cüret edemezsin. O'nun tasarımlarına akıl ermez. Elimizden gelen en iyi şey, alametleri okuyarak hizmetimizin O'nu memnun ettiğini ummaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "Careful, Domin'{name}. Not even you can presume to speak for Him. His designs are unfathomable — the best we can do is read the signs and hope that our service pleases Him."
